title: The Shock of the New Series
creator_credit: David Richardson, Lorna Pegram, RM Productions, Time-Life Films and BBC-TV
brief_description: In this series, art critic and writer Robert Hughes outlines a social history of the development of the visual arts in the 20th century. In each episode, Hughes examines the forces which influenced the directions painting, architecture and photography took from the late 1800’s to the present.
creator_credit_for_label: David Richardson, Lorna Pegram, RM Productions, Time-Life Films and BBC-TV
